d:
Based on one of my most popular games, we bring you Bimbo Quest! The story of how the son of an adventuring monarch becomes a bubbly bimbo! There are some changes from the original story, so hope you enjoy this adaptation!

More comics from Massmanic here: https://www.patreon.com/massmanic/posts
More of my games here: https://www.patreon.com/icarue
https://icarue.itch.io/

Discord: https://discord.gg/AkDntcJpb8

Massmanic is a comic artist known for their Koikatsu comics. Similar to me, they specialize on gender-bending transformations. So if you are into it, feel free to check them out.

If you like a bit more interactivity, feel free to check my games out. The more support I get there, the more comics and games I will be able to do. My games are generally free, so check my Patreon and become a free member to receive updates on them!
